title: Looking for a team to play and have fun with, but also take it seriously (Plat/Gold team)
body:
-currently gold III
-age: 16
-playing time, during the weekends
-language english/german

Just add me on LoL or pn back here.

replies.body: Achso sry, aber ich glaub trotzdem das die meisten auch english koennen.
